ygData.subject: Heritix doesn't observe limit on number of documents
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Everyone, I m using Heritrix 3.1.1 to crawl the contents of a number of sites. I want it to get 10 pages from each seed, not including pages from outlinks

Hi Everyone,

I'm using Heritrix 3.1.1 to crawl the contents of a number of=
 sites. I want it to get 10 pages from each seed, not including pages from =
outlinks of the seed. I set the number of documents limit in the configurat=
ion file to 10, and it passed that. Set it to 20, passed it again. If that'=
s not the right tweak, where should I set the limit for it to work?
About l=
eaving out external pages, I have 100+ sites to crawl, so I can't set regex=
es matching every single URL (and don't know if there's a better way rather=
 than that.)

I'd appreciate any help.
